ModMetaData.name: Non-Binary Gender
ModMetaData.author: divineDerivative
ModMetaData.description: Updated and maintained version of the original mod by Vesper. Adds a non-binary gender option for pawns, as well as relevant precepts. Features: - Configurable chance of pawns being non-binary - Non-binary pawns can have any body type and wear any clothing - Both colonists and world pawns can generate as non-binary - Adds appropriate gender-neutral relationship titles (child instead of son/daughter, etc) - Adds precepts for nudity rules and spouse rules to match vanilla male/female precepts in Ideology - Compatible with Character Editor - Compatible with [NL] Facial Animation - WIP - Gender neutral name options
